publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2801 Bill Kidd: Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law—That the Parliament expresses its disappointment and frustration at the failure of the UK Government to begin ratification of the UN Convention on the Rights of People with Disabilities, designed as the first treaty in history to give the millions of disabled people across the globe comprehensive human rights, despite having signed the convention in March 2007; acknowledges the petition available at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/noreservations/ calling on the Prime Minister to ratify the convention in full by December 2008, and urges the UK Government to do so.

S3M-2801 Bill Kidd: Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law—That the Parliament expresses its disappointment and frustration at the failure of the UK Government to begin ratification of the UN Convention on the Rights of People with Disabilities, designed as the first treaty in history to give the millions of disabled people across the globe comprehensive human rights, despite having signed the convention in March 2007; acknowledges the petition available at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/noreservations/ calling on the Prime Minister to ratify the convention in full by December 2008, and urges the UK Government to do so.

S3M-2801 Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law (lodged on 30 October 2008) Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Wilson*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-2801 Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law (lodged on 30 October 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, John Wilson*, Gil Paterson*, Alex Neil*
S3M-2801 Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law (lodged on 30 October 2008) Dave Thompson*
S3M-2801 Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law (lodged on 30 October 2008) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-2801 Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law (lodged on 30 October 2008) Michael Matheson*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-2801 Time to Enshrine Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Law (lodged on 30 October 2008) Keith Brown*
